name: Diamond Ghost
description:
Diamond Ghost
Version: 1.1

Hurry to catch as many diamonds as you can! Be quick though, since they dissapear after a while...

  • X to start at the title screen.
  • Control the ghost with arrow keys.
  • Catch diamonds before the disappear. Takes 2 sec.
  • If you have less than 3 lives, you will gain one more when you get a diamond.
  • Every 2 sec a green heart shows up.
    If you catch it, it resets ALL your life + energy.

Playing tip: try to move diagonally to save moves!

This is a LO-RES title, using only 64x64 pixels.
Made on the PICO-8.
